entry.summary: Jeff, a finance worker, has brought up the issue that existing financial applications cannot handle more than two decimals, which is causing problems. However, people in finance are accustomed to working with only two decimals and do not have issues with large numbers. For practical reasons, Tam√°s Blummer, founder and CEO of Bits of Proof, supports moving to a unit that equals 100 satoshi, which he calls "bit."
